channel.title: Need help with hamachi
channel.description:
i only can start my server with run.. not with compile is that a problem for starting a serveR?
and also how do i run my game?
first i start my hamachi.. than i start my game with run. thing than i start moparscape.. fill in the ip.. fill in my name... and than i start server and i can log in
but how do other people that with hamachi if they wanna come in my serveR?
they start hamachi join me.. (that i do understand) than they fill in ip? than name? than start server? are they in than?

item.title: Need help with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Devon Devon
item.description:
@Devon wrote:

Your not supposed to be able to start your server with compile… Compile is what updates your things after you’ve edited them. After you run Compile and it says press any key to continue just click enter or whatever.

After that Click Run Server and then minimize that & log into your server.

For others to join you they need:

Your Hamachi IP
Your Port (find that when starting your server, say you run on pimpscape - When you run Run Server it’ll say “Started pimpscape on 0.0.0.0:XXXX” or something to that affect. Where the XXXX is is your port. You will need to give out that port.
& for you to keep running your server.

Read full topic
